ix.icore.plan
Class Plan

java.lang.Object
  ix.icore.AbstractAnnotatedObject

              ix.icore.plan.Plan
All Implemented Interfaces:
Annotated, IXObject, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
DomainAsPlan
public class Plan
extends PlanObject

Represents a plan in a form that can be converted to XML, etc.

See Also:
Serialized Form
